name: FlummiRizer (Alpha 1)
description:
FlummiRizer

Let's rolling!

Roll through a beautiful castle or galaxy map and try to beat the High-Score.
Choose between Sprint and Circuit Time-Attack levels alone or with your friends.

Features:

  • Singleplayer / Coop / Multiplayer (+ Coop)
  • Choose your username and ball layout
  • Choose between Keyboard/Mouse and Gamepad
  • Choose between Castle and Galaxy Map
  • Find routes nobody else found before
  • Be the best in your session and try to beat the world records (Best times over all sessions)

Upcoming:

  • More Maps
  • More Profile-Layouts
  • Mini-Games:
    • Long Jump
    • Dart
    • Brawl
